title: Do the new missions apply to every mode?
body:
just wanted to know if the missions would work in any mode since for Death Sworn it never said what modes and Dressed to Kill says "matchmade" (which i'd assume any matchmade mode)


(im new to game btw)

replies.body:
First of all, welcome to League of Legends! 

Matchmade modes apply to any game where both teams are selected by matchmaking. Modes like ARAM and Normal Summoner's Rift and Twisted Treeline work, but modes like Co-Op vs AI won't. Let me know if you have any questions at all about League of Legends :)
